attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sheila Hancock is not only a great actress and a 'national treasure', she has also, through her books about her life with, and after, John Thaw, helped countless widows and widowers with her frank and moving accounts of grief and survival.

Please, give her the accolade she deserves, and make her Dame Sheila Hancock!

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
